job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description:
We have an urgent need for a Site Reliability Engineer for one of our client's ongoing projects. This is a Remote role for now.     Software Site Reliability EngineerLocation: RemoteType: Contract Duration: 8 Months +       Responsibilities  - Serve as a primary point of contact for the overall health, performance, and capacity of one or more of our services.   
  - Partner closely with our development teams and product managers to architect and build features that are highly available, performant and secure   
  - Develop innovative ways to smartly measure, monitor & report application and infrastructure health   
  - Gain deep knowledge of our application stack   
  - Function well in a fast-paced and rapidly-changing environment   
  - Participate in a 24x7 on-call rotations.   
  - Ability to debug and optimize code and automate routine tasks.   
   Basic Qualifications:  - 3 years of relevant experience in a production environment   
  - Experience in coding in one of the programming languages: C++, C, Java, Python, Go.   
  - Experience with architecting, developing and troubleshooting large scale systems.   
  - Experience with algorithms and data structures and/or Unix/Linux systems internals (e.g., filesystems, system calls) and administration.   
  - Experience with continuous integration and deployment automation tools such as Drone, Spinnaker, Harness, etc.   
   Preferred Qualifications:  - Hands-on working with private or public cloud (GCP / AWS/ Azure)   
  - 3 years of experience in computing, distributed systems, storage, or networking.   
  - Previous experience working with geographically-distributed coworkers.   
  - Should have led teams, collaborating cross-functionally to deliver complex software features and solutions.
